readable.title: 482882719_165722082d
readable.content: A group of people go rafting . A person flies backward off a blue raft near rapids . Six people are riding in raft on white water whilst the seventh person has been flung out of the boat into the air . The guy gets thrown out of the raft on the rapids . The six people are in a blue raft in the water and one person flew out of the raft .
